website_summaries.verdict: A versatile high-flow hose nozzle that offers a selection of 7 different water patterns.
pros: The maximum flow rate this model offers is an impressive 9.5 gallons per minute
The extra-large on/off level makes this hose nozzle fun and easy to operate while the variety of spray patterns allows the user to accomplish a wide range of tasks
cons: Some users experienced a great deal of leaking

customer_reviews.title: 2 of 3 Units Leaked Profusely
customer_reviews.text: I love the design of the push mechanism to adjust the water flow, so I bought two of them. Opened the package and put the first one on a hose and voila! Great! Put the 2nd one on a hose and it LEAKED, profusely, from the slider mechanism and from the face of the nozzle. I contacted Amazon and they send me a replacement ... guess what - it leaks too. So 2 of 3 units leaked - that's a failing grade. I ordered two of a different brand with a similar design and they both work fine. I'd stay away from these guys.
customer_reviews.author: Graphic Girl

customer_reviews.title: Soooo very big! But delicate like the last rose of summer.
customer_reviews.text: This nozzle is so large that it will make some folks blush and others envious. But looks are deceiving. Large does not always portend sturdiness or durability. Heck, look what happened in the mortgage crisis of the early aughts! Remember too big to fail? This nozzle failed. Big time. And I don’t want my fate to befall you. Avoid this nozzle. Also avoid banking institutions that issue a lot of subprime loans—if you can. But this nozzle hemorrhages water from between the dial and handle housing. Pretty sure this failure had less to do with corporate largesse and more with shoddy plastic pieces which, although impressively sized, proved embarrassingly ineffective.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan Lowcash

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a life time hose nozzle. This feels so good in the hand as it’s nice and heavy and it just fits well. BUT. After 2 months of use, it is now leaking like a sieve - actually more like a busted water pipe. We do often just drop our hose nozzle on the driveway so it was constantly being jostled, but I had hopes is would survive a gardeners abuse. Not so.
customer_reviews.author: mrskatie

customer_reviews.title: Leaks like a sieve
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these. There's one setting in particular that leaks and drips all over my hands. The others work ok. Water flow seems somewhat restricted. It doesn't spray as far as the cheaper sprayer I replaced with this unit. I do appreciate it came with the Melnor quick connect and I didn't have to pay nearly three bucks to buy just that piece, which is ridiculously expensive. Overall, it's ok. It does seem durable and like it'll last a long time. The grip seems a little uncomfortable to hold. But it's just a sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazons Customers

customer_reviews.title: Not durable.  Broke after 1.5 months!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this nozzle for just over a month and it is now completely unusable. Water sprays everywhere from the thumb controller. Unfortunately it is now 2 weeks past the return date. Very disappointed as I purposefully got this unit based on the company's description as heavyweight and rugged. It is not durable at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Sprang a leak after light usage.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about a month. I use it with an expandable hose. It feels heavy and sturdy and worked great for the first couple of weeks. Then it started leaking. And the leak seems to come from around the metal strip that goes over the top and runs down each side of the sprayer. So while the spay head is still doing it's job, my hand and arm get a constant drippy stream of cold water running down them. I'm disappointed because I can't see that this is any better than a cheaper plastic one. Can't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Gerke

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a couple of weeks
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this one. Unfortunately it started to leak just after a couple of weeks. Leaks water everywhere. Too bad because otherwise it feels like it’s well made. I would just return it but due to the “shelter in place” i will not be risking anything to return a defective product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too good to be true...
customer_reviews.text: Got this nozzle and was shocked on how well it feels. Amazingly sturdy and solid... or so it seems. This nozzle lasted about 3 months of very very light use (sometimes bathe the dog, sometimes fill a bucket of water...) and today I dropped it for the first time EVER from waist height. Immediately the insides of the nozzle broke, and stays spraying no matter water. I knew it was too good to be true, its actually super cheap and flimsy on the inside!!!!!!! So sick of buying cheap-o nozzles that fail so damn quick. So over it. 1/5 Dont buy this mess. Buy name brand, quality controlled stuff, preferably USA made.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Leaks all over the place
customer_reviews.text: Check out the photo attached. When it was brand new, it worked great. But only after a few months of use, it's leaking all over the place and it's hard to use without getting yourself soaked. Of course I'm past my return date. I can't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BOlson

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 45 days: I thought I was buying quality, I received a paperweight
customer_reviews.text: Nozzle was great ...for 45 days. Moderate usage. Never slammed or dropped. Then, it suddenly stopped working. I moved all the working parts---up down...pulled trigger... checked hose..checked water pressure. I thought it may have been clogged (but was confused as to why it would be) so I took it apart. Still, nothing was clogged. So, I soaked it in CLR. Still nothing. Somewhere, in this brand NEW nozzle--- is a mechanical error. Now I get to throw it in my shed as a paperweight. Very disappointed. Its a nozzle. How does one build one that doesn't work? Melnor-- I think you just opted me out of your brand name. Avoid. I thought I was buying quality, I received a paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M. Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Really nice but broke after two weeks.
customer_reviews.text: I had one before this one that lasted three seasons, this is the exact one I thought so I got it. But this one broke after two weeks. I was out of my return window so I did the warranty claim and ordered a new one in the meantime. It's been four days since I placed the claim and I'm yet to get an email from the company. Melnor finally responded and sent a replacement with no hassle and no cost. Very satisfied now.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Delivers the most water in a standard garden hose.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best garden hose nozzle I’ve come across. Before this I always used the Garedenites, which are more expensive, though I haven’t noticed any difference in quality. The Melnor has better spray patterns, the ‘Full’ for instance delivers far more water, which means I don’t have to spend as much time attending to those dry patches in the lawn. We have sprinklers but the heat in the High Desert wreaks havoc with landscaping and there are always some areas and plants needing more water than others. So after years of using the Gardenites, I’ve changed everything over to these Melnors.
customer_reviews.author: GlevumGuy.

customer_reviews.title: Nice...bought a second one.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using a "high end" fireman-style nozzle with a built in flow switch, but the switch is small and hard to engage for quick on-off scenarios where I don't want to mess with the current nozzle pattern. Thought I'd try a triggered nozzle for a change on another hose that I needed a new nozzle for. Well this is a nice unit and checks all the boxes for me: multiple usable patterns (some I don't use), paddle flow control, instant on-off, and a constant on trigger hold. Price is right and seems durable. Hope it lasts but I'll update if leaks from the pattern selector (which isn't user serviceable).
customer_reviews.author: ememen

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad so far but it is BIG and the FULL setting really does not work well
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big guy, and I've got big hands. This thing is a BIG nozzle. That makes it a bit uncomfortable to work with long term. I don't know about durability because I've only had it for a few weeks. That seems to be the chief complaint. I'll edit this after a few months or by end of the season. One issue, the FULL setting where you tupically get full control over fine spray to ling stream does not work well at all. It's basically ON or OFF on a stream of water. I miss having a FULL setting in the garden. I probably would not buy this again, but I have it now so I'll stick with it.
customer_reviews.author: Billy B

customer_reviews.title: careful of the feature
customer_reviews.text: I received the different model of the product. I did not want to return it cause it will take another week. I had to swallow. Just to careful what you order and what you get. I will think twice to purchase from anything from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Joey and Kat

customer_reviews.title: works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: great flow options, especially the one that is "open" flow similar to having the full amount of water coming from the hose but in a smaller diameter. Feels sturdy and does not leak. I would have hoped this type of trigger gun costs less as there is nothing to it, it all looks plastic on the outside. I would say that turning the knob for selecting the spray options is on the hard side of the spectrum but has a solid/satisfying motion/click to each step. I cannot comment about durability as I have had it for less than a week.
customer_reviews.author: BHA

customer_reviews.title: 2X Tried & 2X Failed Product
customer_reviews.text: I had this same exact sprayer (Melnor XT452 XT Metal Nozzle, Multi-Pattern, Heavyweight Thumb Control) for several years before it started to leak between the parts that move to switch the various sprays. I decided to buy another because of how much I like the way it works when working properly - not leaking all over me. I was hoping for the best. I do not let the sprayer drop to the ground, treated it gently, however, less than a month of use it has begun the same issues as the previous one. I am ticked off - paying for a poor product and my stupidity to buy the same poor-working product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Decent adjustable pattern sprayer
customer_reviews.text: I got this to work with a reduced water pressure system to allow filtering of the water to reduce minerals, so that I can have a solution for a spot free rinse. Once I hooked this up after the flow restrictor and found the pattern that I wanted, I discovered that it rinsed well - so it was a win for me. Time will tell on durability. I bought this to be dedicated to the rinse free system, so it never has untreated water in it to minimize the risk of water spots that might arise from using the same nozzle with our regular water, which is very loaded with minerals.
customer_reviews.author: WileEC

customer_reviews.title: The Best So Far...
customer_reviews.text: I've tried every sprayer that remotely looks like it will hold up and without a handle that looks like it will snag on things when rolling up the hose. I had several very expensive plastic sprayers that worked well for a year and the would refuse to shut off - Gave up on them. This is looking to be a good sprayer. It has some weight to it, but my petite wife likes it. It seems exceedingly well built and has great spray selections. And it is 25% the cost of the plastic sprayers - I bought two of these and am very happy with my purchase...
customer_reviews.author: CoconutGrover

customer_reviews.title: Good nozzle with misleading title
customer_reviews.text: I give this two stars because the listing title says "...Metal Nozzle with QuickConnect Product Adapter Set" when, in fact, it does not include the quick-connector "set". It includes just one of the two parts needed to use this feature. The other piece is sold separately (which is noted in the detailed description). My initial impression of the product itself is that it's surprisingly heavy, a bit larger than expected, and will prove to be a good, durable hose nozzle for the money. That was my main priority in choosing this item, so I will be keeping it despite the misleading/erroneous listing.
customer_reviews.author: RJP

customer_reviews.title: Love these high quality, durable nozzles
customer_reviews.text: The spray patterns are perfect and I’ve had no leaks. I’ve owned other name brand nozzles that have failed in that department miserably. I’ve tossed them all and replaced them with upper end Melnors. But as with ANYTHING else, you have to take care of it! I’ve learned the hard way not to throw it on the ground when I’m done with it no matter how much of a hurry I’m in, don’t let it lay in loose dirt of sand allowing particles to get into the selector mechanism. I also take it completely off the hose and store it indoors (garage) over the winter and check the washers and replace when needed. I love these!
customer_reviews.author: RoyLin71

customer_reviews.title: garden spray setting squirts random stream away from shower
customer_reviews.text: First, this is NOT the beautiful metal melnor xt you can buy at lowes (but they all sold out quick this year): it is entirely plastic. but the problem is, the setting all gardeners use (shower, gentle shower, etc.) has one spray (at 12:00) that for some reason squirts 5 feet away from the rest of the gentle stream. I returned this, but the second one (from another vendor) had the EXACT same defect. may not sound like much, but it really makes it much worse to use (on containers, on beds, etc.) ps the quick snap attachment is VERY useful though and highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: cloddi

customer_reviews.title: Like having a power washer AND a rain wand attached to your hose
customer_reviews.text: On the tightest setting, it's like having a power washer. Easy to use, easy to set to other, less powerful settings. I can use it to water my (delicate) asparagus, then dial the knob and push the bar, and power-wash my wooden fence, then turn it down a bit and clean my AC coils. In fact, we did that exact thing today! No need to swap attachments! The friend who was helping me today with these chores asked if I could get him one. That's one heck of an endorsement!
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: Hi power professional grade sprayer
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sprinkler head with high pressure features. My one outdoor water faucet is hooked to the 1 inch line that goes to my underground sprinkler so I probably have extra pressure because of that. But, I have used other smaller pistol like sprayers on this line and even though they worked well this new Melnor sprayer is the best I have ever had. When I buy again? I doubt it because this one is built like it will last the rest of my life. But if the need occurred, yes, I would buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Works great and very well made
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to get this because it costs only $10.99. I thought it would be poor quality compared with the other sprayers costing north of $20. However, I have always loved Melnor products and so decide to give it a try. I was really amazed. It is very well made, feels solid and sturdy and works every bit as well as my other more expensive sprayers. I ordered another one. Rarely does something cost a lot less and yet is equally good. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction. Not a quality product. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: It’s clearly evident that on first inspection and feel that the handle will eventually fail and snap like mine did. Not even 2 months old with light use. I’m only watering plants and it stays in one location. See pics to see how well I maintained the nozzle. This is just a bad product design and it needs to be investigated. To be clear: This item is defective and all items should be pulled from stores as there is a huge flaw with the quality of the handle. It’s not “will mine break too?” It’s a matter of when.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Shower Mode Isn't Gentle Enough
customer_reviews.text: The main reason I bought this nozzle was to water plants in my garden, and the nozzle's shower mode just isn't gentle enough for this purpose. The problem is that shower mode doesn't use enough water jets. As a result, the individual jets are too thick and powerful, and if you turn down the nozzle's output, the result is jets of large water droplets, not a gentle shower like I got with my old Gardena multi-purpose spray gun. This is fine for, say, washing a car, but not for watering fragile seedlings. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Kenji Spencer

customer_reviews.title: This is the only kind we use. Great Company!
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say about this product except everything in the description is 100% accurate. Not only that but I had mine for so long more than 10 years. When the nozzle stopped working I bought this one. In the mean time I e-mailed their customer service to ask them how I could fix the nozzle that just wouldn't come on after having it for so long, I didn't want to give it up! lol.. Guess what they did!! No questions asked they sent me a new one!! So now I have an extra one. Pretty sure they will last me a life time now! Great Company!!
customer_reviews.author: Ronda  Frank

customer_reviews.title: Substantial Nozzle with thumb control and great stream variety
customer_reviews.text: Thumb-drive nozzles should replace the trigger variety! I've owned several that have failed, but this one feels the most substantial of I'll I've yet tried. The stream function shoots farther than my last one. Shower is perfectly calibrated as the best option for watering all the flowering plants. I haven't need the soaker, but it dribbles in better way than last nozzle. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: DcMs

customer_reviews.title: Favorite nozzle
customer_reviews.text: We go through a lot of hose nozzels at my business, i've tried dozens of different brands. These are my favorite, eventually someone drops it to hard on the concrete floor and the head breaks and pops off the handle but I don't think it's a quality problem as much as it is an abusive environment and probably our fault. Luckily they are fairly priced so replacement cost doesn't hurt as much. On number 6 or 7 now I believe.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Very low water pressure due to orfice inside.
customer_reviews.text: This thing feels sturdy and feels durable BUT im more concerned about the internal canals of this nozzle. It doesn't shoot water very far compared to my old $19 hose i got from Ochard Supply. I believe the orfice they're using in the melnor are wider. It gets the job done but you gotta select the Jet setting to do what my old Shower setting could do. The water pressute on this thing isn't that great. Its a bit too awkward and big to hold in my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel W

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing to get an item which doesn't have all the required parts. The quickConnect Adapter Set is fantastic idea but doesn't make sense if you only include one of the 2 parts. Why not include both the male and female adapters so it's a complete set? Beyond me...Additionally, even after I used plumber's tape, water started leaking from the nozzle so I strongly recommend against getting this product.
customer_reviews.author: Swathi

customer_reviews.title: Leaks from the head.
customer_reviews.text: I really expected this to be a more solid product. It appears to be made so well. I bought 2 and both leak from the head. Also I lost one of the unique washers and tried to replace it with a regular washer but it leaked horribly. Luckily I found the original one and put it back in. I am trying to find replacement washers and have not had any luck so far.
customer_reviews.author: Tracee

customer_reviews.title: Solidly built and outlasts the all plastic sprayers
customer_reviews.text: I've tried so many plastic multi-position sprayers from the name brands and they all fail within a year. Either internal components fail, they leak, or because I sometimes drag my hoses around, the selector disc gets ripped off the face of the sprayer. This is the best of the multi-position sprayers I've tried. Heavier than all the others because of the metal frame, but far more durable.
customer_reviews.author: P Dub

customer_reviews.title: About what you would expect for the price
customer_reviews.text: I sprayer is no different then others. The first thing I did was to remove the rotating selector and apply silicon grease to the inside surface of the selector. It comes as a dry surface which leads to the "O" ring drying out and sticking thus leading to early failure. I am hoping that by use a bit of silicon grease this problem will be eliminated. This has been the reason for failures of similar sprayers in the past.
customer_reviews.author: works hard for his money

customer_reviews.title: Product is as advertised and came in on time.
customer_reviews.text: So far Melnor products have been very reliable and hope this one proves to be as good quality as their products have been in the past. One problem with most sellers is the purchaser is asked to review the product in E-mails before they have a chance to open the box it came in. If I'm going to give a review I at least want to try it out first.
customer_reviews.author: BLANCH

customer_reviews.title: Great! Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Just what we needed to replace our old one. Lots of different spray functions
customer_reviews.author: rach

customer_reviews.title: Great sprayer.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that is questionable about this sprayer is that it is on the heavy side, and the spray is strong. I personally love that it has weight because I have a tendency to drop them on the ground and need something beefy. My mother would never use this because of it's weight and strength. So if you're looking for a heavy duty sprayer, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: dawn

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy at all, leaks like crazy
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this sprayer. I ordered two and within weeks they both started leaking water while spraying, drenching my shoes and pants. I tried tightening the screw in the center to see if that would help but to no avail. I am only a few days past the return deadline, so I’m stuck with these. They’ll go in the trash as soon as I order a replacement from another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley L.

customer_reviews.title: Really Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This nozzle is awesome. We use it for washing horses. It has multiple settings that are perfect for different areas of the body. The mist setting is very soft and the animals allow us to use it even around their ears and eyes. It is very sturdy and easy to use. It is comfortable to hold and can be turned on and off with one hand easily.
customer_reviews.author: JMC

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke immediately
customer_reviews.text: The handle broke the second time I used it. I filled out the paperwork on Melnor's website for a replacement. A nuisance. We'll see if and how long it takes for a replacement. This product is highly rated and I didn't expect poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: CarefulShopper

customer_reviews.title: Very, very solid nozzle. The best built in our stash.
customer_reviews.text: I'd give it five stars if it had been more clear (misleading bold header...buried in the lower print) that the quick connect needed an additional purchase. But I really don't care about the connection for my application. And, it does operate better than any of the other ones we have. Time will tell, but it looks very sturdy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Magwa Keener

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke @2 weeks (not daily)
customer_reviews.text: If the seller makes this right I will update this review! Handle broke @30days of purchase, so I can't simply return for refund like usual.. I would say I used it like 7 times
customer_reviews.author: lalaley

customer_reviews.title: Very well made.
customer_reviews.text: This is for the black metal FRONT trigger with the adjustable lever for pressure on the back...not sure about the other configurations but this one is very nice! Has a little heft to it but is easy to use and hold and works great. Feels like it’ll last quite a while but we’ll see over time how it holds up in the central Florida heat!
customer_reviews.author: Ron in Sebring

customer_reviews.title: Leaked. Watering sprayer is lower flow and increased time needed to water
customer_reviews.text: Leaked all over the user. Handle is very heavy duty, but spray head quality doesn't reflect that of the rest of the device. Watering shower setting was too constrictive and nearly doubled my watering time over the last hose sprayer I was using.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel B. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Water Nozzle...
customer_reviews.text: Well made hose nozzle. That sums it up. Ferls great in your hand once connected to the water hose. Got a great "Feel & Weight" to it. The "Seven Nozzle Adjustments" click with ease and gives the desired water flow with precision. We made for the price offered. Will last few water hoses for sure without a shafow of a doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Indy

customer_reviews.title: Starting leaking just over a month....got replacement
customer_reviews.text: I loved this nozzle - while it worked. Five weeks in it starting leaking from two or three of the nozzle settings - pouring water straight down in addition to from the setting....not usable. Disappointed. Hoped it would be durable. Update - Melnor sent me a replacement nozzle - very kind of them - no hassle at all. Hopefully this one will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Can’t stop shopping

customer_reviews.title: Already had one; this is second order; like both
customer_reviews.text: So far, great item. I had ordered one previously to "try it out". I liked it so well that I ordered another (this one). I like the ability to adjust the spray type separately from the volume adjustment, and so far it does NOT leak!
customer_reviews.author: LarryW

customer_reviews.title: Very nice feel to it
customer_reviews.text: I've bought and broken many plastic nozzles but I have a feeling this one is going to stay with me for a very long time. I think the few extra $$ is worth it. I love the way it feels and spays water. The fit is tight and the water sprays as expected with I rotated to various features. All in all a great value.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Great Hose head
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this for a few weeks but spray is steady and great. Easy to control the flow and has a great feel. Hoping it lasts more than a year. I feel like if it survives past a year on our community garden rooftop, it would prove its durability. Will revisit in a year - but looking to buy 1-2 more for our garden.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Saggio

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using it for about a month now. It does not leak is switch is very easily you can slow your pressure down at the nozzle. It seems very well-made. I’m guilty I’m just dropping it on the ground quite often and it’s holding up to my abuse. Plan on buying a second one for the front yard hose
customer_reviews.author: JOHN GAMBARDELLA

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating Design Flaw
customer_reviews.text: Seriously? Doesn't the manufacturer test a prototype before they put it into production? If you pull the trigger with the nozzle pointing anywhere other than horizontal (e.g., down at your lawn or garden) the trigger locking wire interferes with the trigger and prevents the nozzle from operating. It's so annoying to have to pull the trigger repeatedly to get it to engage, especially when you have to aim it somewhere you don't want to water in order make the nozzle operate.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chyzik

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use Without Stress on Your Hand!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this metal hose nozzle. Easy to turn on and off, and you don't need to hold the handle in to keep the water flowing as you do with most "pistol grip" style nozzles. I don't really need so many spray options, but it doesn't hurt. I do wish the jet stream was a little stronger. My previous pistol grip nozzle had a much stronger stream using the same hose. That would be my only complaint. Otherwise, great for watering and general use.
customer_reviews.author: R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, but locking mechanism doesn’t work right
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy duty nozzle. Main criticism is that the knob adjustment/lock to keep the handle depressed doesn’t work right. In essence, you can’t not trigger the lock because the adjustment won’t go far enough, so every time you squeeze it locks. Easy fix as I just removed the lock, but would be nice to have it work as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Simpson

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice hose attachment and I would readily buy it again. The different settings for the spray are easily changed and it even has a mister that really comes in handy to cool your flowers or veggies off after a long, hot day, without hitting them hard! Durable, practical and well priced!
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: happy with this sprayer
customer_reviews.text: we had an old leaky spray head. i bought this because it was from the same brand as the quick connect attachments i purchased. really happy with both the quick connect attachments and the spray head. its been a while now since i can turn off the hose at the sprayer and not see water leaking from somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: George D.

customer_reviews.title: More water on plants less on pants
customer_reviews.text: This is the replacement From Melnor and the front spaying dial leaks out of the other holes and drips down you hand or hose usually soaking my shoes or my front pant legs is this normal it wound up every time and only used for household use only
customer_reviews.author: joe grimes

customer_reviews.title: Very good flow rate
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why they felt the need for such a large flow Handel? Probably because it makes some men feel like they are holding onto more than they are used to. 😂 Other than that, it does have a very high flow rate and I like the stream options and it feels well made. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Crane

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Description
customer_reviews.text: Their selling point of "quick connect product adapter set" is NOT included. They include one half (of the necessary pair) and the other half is "available fo purchase." So if you're interested in that easy/adjustable/adaptable feature, or you just say no to misleading ads, you might think twice. It's a basic nozzle is all.
customer_reviews.author: MBCS

customer_reviews.title: Great product but parts might be missing
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd nozzle I have bought from Melnor. The 1st one I bought 2 years ago and is still sprays well but I just wanted ine for the back yard. In this one they added a quick connect product adapter but not the quick connect product end connector so I don't know if it suppose to come with it or if its just missing from the box. But it is a great nozzle and will continue to support Melnor.
customer_reviews.author: Alex P.

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! I purchased two and they work great. They have the quick connect part that goes into the handle, but you'll have to purchase the part for your hose separately. The handle appears to be well made. I like the lock function so you can keep the water wide open without having to squeeze the trigger.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie P

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Flexible Water Sprays
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy duty water nozzle that is the most durable I have ever found. It allows the user to select one of several different water delivery, from a strong force single stream to a multiple stream that delivers gentle water delivery to small or tender plants. The thumb control of the power allows the user to choose the perfect water delivery for every need in the yard. Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ed

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: got the heavyweight rear trigger and it is built tough, it isn't going to fail like my old one did (water trigger broke). I think it will last a long time. Weird thing, when I put the hose on too tight it leaked. loosened it a bit and now no leaks
customer_reviews.author: Zac

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete parts
customer_reviews.text: The product supposedly comes "with QuickConnect Product Adapter Set" but the nozzle received (as shown in their picture) includes only one small adapter part to allow Quick Connect. I did not include the mating half! I thought maybe it came with the hose I also bought, but no luck there, either. So the description leads you to expect the whole adapter, but they only send a useless half. Fortunately the nozzle works great when screwed on to a hose. The "adaptor, however is not even a good paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: Skip

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Had owned the plastic version of this and it lasted pretty good. I needed to replace the plastic version and found this metal version . After a brief use of the metal version, I believe it will last even longer than the plastic version.
customer_reviews.author: DR Pop

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these online from this seller. Both were defective and broke within days of starting use on a regular garden hose. The pressure forced the plastic parts on the side to push out, and it was not fixable. I have never had this happen with a Melnor nozzle that I bought from a Home Depot or Loew's which are good products and usually last for three or four years, at least. I would avoid this product from this seller. Very disappointing. I did not pursue a return because it is simply not worth the the time, but I do want other buyers to be aware of the problems that I had with this product from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher R. Rowley

customer_reviews.title: Mine does not leak and works great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased and began using this in January and it is now mid June. I live in central Texas so I water year round. Love the thumb control feature! It is a game changer when watering for any length of time. Also works beautifully when washing my dog and need to use my hands while holding the nozzle between my knees. I am surprised by many reviews of leaking. I plan to buy another of this same product soon and will update review after some usage.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Held up great for 5 years of heavy use
customer_reviews.text: This sprayer held up great for 5 years of heavy use. When the seals started to go out I went with another brand and by the end of the week I ordered this one again. Easy to modulate the water flow down low and can still flow high GPM when fully open.
customer_reviews.author: D C.

customer_reviews.title: Affordable multinozzle
customer_reviews.text: The nozzle leak a very little bit, but from where the water jets out, and only when your spraying, but the multi nozzle is kinda of fun, and way more useful than trying to adjust the tip for the spray you want. Very functional, so glad i purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Yen Chen

customer_reviews.title: The Thumb control is the Cats Meow
customer_reviews.text: The Thumb Control lets you operate the nozzle with one hand and provides much better control over the flow rate than the more common pistol trigger / lever type nozzles. Definitely a superior design. This product feel sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Durable and well made
customer_reviews.text: this is my second one. I have one in my front yard and bought this one for my back yard. Works well only thing I do not like is the locking ring on the bottom. I took it off cause it got in the way. other then that I love it
customer_reviews.author: Stu Suemoto

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to spray the lawn after spreading the turf builder. No dripping and all the settings work fine. It came with everything I need to screw on the end of my hose. I'm pleased. Just need my grass to grow thicker and summer to hurry and get here.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and durable!
customer_reviews.text: I am a little shocked to read such a large number of reviews about leaking. I purchased one last May and it has been my favorite sprayer ever! I am not gentle with it at all, it takes a beating for sure. I love that you don't need to squeeze it all the time, you adjust flow with your thumb. I am going to purchase another now for the front of the house, but if it leaks I will send it back immediately!
customer_reviews.author: js1976

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy This ...
customer_reviews.text: This sprinkler head, from this supposedly good company, fell apart...broke right in my hand, the button holding the adjuster valve came off, and can't be glued back on. PLUS...no returns after a certain time (90 days!). You'd think this kind of item can last longer then 3 mos! It doesn't. Find another one!
customer_reviews.author: SamF.

customer_reviews.title: Thumb flow control-shut off broke in a few months
customer_reviews.text: The thumb flow control and shut off easily broke after the return window. I wanted to like it and even bought 4 after seeing how heavy-duty appearing they seemed. Big mistake since one thumb flow control broke before the end of one gardening season and another is freezing up making it hard on the poor old arthritic thumb! Planned obsolescence? How about unplanned product suicide.
customer_reviews.author: Fionasshadow

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these. They leak and not from the faucet. It leaks like a steady stream of water. I have tried every setting and with the same results. Poorly made. I should of returned them but tried to fix them and it didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Great nozzle
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite spray nozzle. Better than anything you’ll find at Menards. Good trigger feel and plenty of spray patterns. The spray lock thingy can be a little tricky especially if you’ve got fatter fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Vader540

customer_reviews.title: Well made and easy for arthritic hands to handle!
customer_reviews.text: I found this watering nozzle at Home Depot and liked it a lot. I went back to buy another and found they had change their item to another that was much more difficult to work for hands that have chronic pain. Luckily I found this on Amazon. It is the same item I was happy with. I recommend it and it's quality highly!!
customer_reviews.author: K Allen

customer_reviews.title: Leaks like crazy
customer_reviews.text: Leaks like crazy after just a few days, leaks around the bottom where the rubber gasket is and leaks around the head. The spray pattern doesn’t line up on the head either, you put it on stream and it’s fan things like that
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Newhouse

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke on the 3 day.
customer_reviews.text: I don't write review often but this one was a bit ridiculous. The handle broke the third day of use. The handle broke right at the pivot point close brass adjustable screw. The plastic on this thing was so cheaply made you are not going to want a second one so the warranty should not be considered. I knew as soon as I got it that it would not last long - super light plastic feel. I would avoid this and look for something a bit better.
customer_reviews.author: Kainoa

customer_reviews.title: Not new, but works.
customer_reviews.text: The item seems to be a good product. I ordered the Amazon bundle which came with a quick connect adapter. The sprayer was heavily used and was obviously returned by someone else. I didn't order a used product. Beware that product will come used and will not be in perfect condition. Mine works so I will be keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The Melnor brand is good quality. Their nozzles last 10x as long as other brands of similar price point. The front trigger version is weird. I ended up replacing with the rear trigger version.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Super heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: This is one serious hose nozzle. Super heavy duty and at the same time less expensive than all the others. I was pleasantly surprised when I opened up the package. If your looking for a hose nozzle this is the one to get.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit to hand and provides a nice presure for washing my car
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to screw the brass fitting in tighter for a more powerful flow of water. then when you squeeze the handle you will get a more power flow of water. Nice size, fit and materials seem good quality and nice options for type of spray pattern.
customer_reviews.author: mac_camper

customer_reviews.title: 9.5 GPM rated flow rate
customer_reviews.text: Had this for about a month. The flow is awesome for the "shower" mode. It really puts water down fast while not being to rough to disturb the rocks/dirt that are on then ground where you're watering. I just wish the price was a bit lower.
customer_reviews.author: Reid Y

customer_reviews.title: Works well enough
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to use but not the smoothest experience. When I limit the water flow, it starts dribbling excess The way to patch it is kind of inconvenient but isn't a pain Don't love it. Don't hate it. Does a good enough job
customer_reviews.author: The_Queens_Secret

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.  Bought 3, all leaked within 2 months
customer_reviews.text: We bought 3 of these because we liked the thumb water volume control and because they looked durable. However, within 2 months of starting use of them, everyone of them leaked around the twist head. They didn't leak a little, they leaked a lot and soaked the person using the sprayer. I am buying 3 new nozzles form another company as a result. These are less expensive and I guess you get what you pay for. Definitely not worth it at any price.
customer_reviews.author: Maryland

customer_reviews.title: leaking nozzle
customer_reviews.text: I have used these nozzles for several years. Had this one replaced and it is now leaking. Is their a way to repair the nozzle? I really do like these nozzles. I have other nozzles for a coupe of years and they do not leak.
customer_reviews.author: Leon Slim

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I was very much impressed when I got this product. After couple of months of usage, it started leaking at the place where it connects to the hose. Tried a different hose and still leaks. I wouldn't purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: SARAVANAKUMAR

customer_reviews.title: Plastic handle, not metal
customer_reviews.text: While this product is described as having a metal rear nozzle, the handle is actually plastic, which is kind of deceiving. I am replacing a different product which also has a plastic handle that wore out while the rest of the sprayer works fine. I decided to keep this sprayer, but disappointed that the description does not match the product.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Brakes easily
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this sprayer at first but it broke within the first couple weeks. I’ve had a few similar sprayers purchased at local hardware stores & they held up just fine. Wish I could return it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love my new hose nozzle. One of the settings is almost like using a power washing device. Sprinkle mode is just perfect for flowers. Price was right. Quality is good. Doesn’t feel like cheap plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Evava

customer_reviews.title: Makes an awful noise
customer_reviews.text: worked fine for a week or so and now makes an awful noise no matter what pressure level or watering pattern is chosen. real loud disturbing screeching noise that does not go away. i was foolish and bought 4 of them at the same time. All 4 have the same problem. so it is a defect and not an isolated case
customer_reviews.author: Z  Shamz

customer_reviews.title: Lasted Only Two Months
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this nozzle, but it broke after two months of use. See picture. I will be shopping for an all metal one. I'm getting tired of replacing these cheap plastic ones.
customer_reviews.author: J. LEE

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: My sister and her husband were traveling on vacation and I volunteered to water their garden and shrubs.They had this nozzle on their hoses. I immediately fell in love with it. I could flip the thumb control and hold the nozzle easily for an extended period of time. No cramping in my hand from constantly squeezing a lever like on many other nozzles. This is a sturdy nozzle with ten different spray settings, which adjust easily as well. I ordered two. One for my home use and one for the stable so that I can bath my horse with ease.
customer_reviews.author: NLK

customer_reviews.title: Part Missing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these as I have had them in the past and I like them. However, one is missing the screen, see photo. It is a pain to return one and reorder and maybe get another with the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: mavikuke

customer_reviews.title: this one is the best I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Each year I by two of such "Toys" for my garden equipment; however, this one is the best I have ever bought. You can feel the quality just by holding it! The water flow controller is superb! Now I hope it will work for a long time instead of 3-6 months without leaking as the other once purchased in the average store (Home Depot, Menards or Lowes). Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Valdi

customer_reviews.title: Best Nozle Have ever had.
customer_reviews.text: The settings are just what they say they are. If it says "shower" it is definitely a shower stream. If it says "spray" it is just that, a nice spray, and the mist or whatever. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this so much, I ordered another for my other hose. As long as they never change this product, I will not buy another kind. Very highly recommend this to everyone. This is the first one that doesn't leak AT ALL. LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Frost

customer_reviews.title: Seems well made
customer_reviews.text: This is good, it doesn't drip, the water is completely shut off when the handle is released, and it has several spray pattern options. Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: James D.

product_meta.title: Melnor 65058-AMZ Torrent 7-Pattern Nozzle with QuickConnect Product Adapter Set, Multi
product_meta.description: Color:Torrent| Size:Multi-Pattern| Style:Amazon BundleBuilt extra tough for the professionals, yet designed for everyday usetorrent is the perfect all-purpose powerful cleaning tool. With a maximum water flow, up 9. 5 gallon A Min, it provides the full water spray you need to tackle any job. Simply pull back on the extra-large lever to easily control the water flow & spray dirt away from the siding, rinse off the walkway, or quickly wash the car. Multiple spray patterns make it easy to complete all of your outdoor chores. Built extra tough for the professionals, yet designed for everyday usetorrent is the perfect all-purpose powerful cleaning tool. With a maximum water flow, up 9. 5 gallon A Min, it provides the full water spray you need to tackle any job. Simply pull back on the extra-large lever to easily control the water flow & spray dirt away from the siding, rinse off the walkway, or quickly wash the car. Multiple spray patterns make it easy to complete all of your outdoor chores. Need additional information or assistance from Melnor? Leave feedback or ask a question below. We value your experience with us.
feature_bullets: 7 patterns for a variety of tough cleaning jobs
Built with a metal core and durable rubber coating for years of reliable use
Maximum water flow over 9. 5 gallons per minute
Quickly connect and disconnect the nozzle with an included QuickConnect Product Adapter (Requires QuickConnect Product End Connector sold separately)
Backed by the Melnor Limited Lifetime . We stand behind our products.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars2,548 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
